metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3158 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A race condition in Guacamole's terminal emulator in versions 0.9.5 through 0.9.10-incubating could allow writes of blocks of printed data to overlap. Such overlapping writes could cause packet data to be misread as the packet length, resulting in the remaining data being written beyond the end of a statically-allocated buffer.

criterions.comment: guacamole: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
guacamole-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
